channel.title: Misc random help

item.title: Misc random help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

case 324: if (playerLevel[playerFishing] < 5) { return; } int chance = new java.util.Random().nextInt(100) + 1; if (chance > 40) { // 60% chance for sardine. fishId = 325; reqFishing = 5; } else { // 40% chance for herring. fishId = 345; reqFishing = 10; } pEmote = 622; req = 307; break;

Read full topic

item.title: Misc random help
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

hey guys !

Im kinda stuck here, i can’t remember how i do this. i’m trying to add like about 60% change you catch a sardin and 40% to you catch a herring. I need some help with Misc.random, can’t remember how i shall add it. a mini tut will be grate.

case 324: if(playerLevel[playerFishing] >= 5) { pEmote = 622; fishId = 325; req = 307; reqFishing = 5; } else { if(playerLevel[playerFishing] >= 5) { pEmote = 622; fishiD = 345; req = 307; reqFishing = 10; } }

Read full topic
